title: user defined connection parameters passed as variables to Ext. tool
author: Bjelko
body_snippet: Hi. I have 200+ MSSQL servers with different  instances, different users, passwords. It would be good to have possibilty to add some user defined parameters for connection not just predefined like %hostname% %password%... and then pass/send it to external tools like %param1% %param2% or so... Thanks in advance

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels.
